body: I've been waiting so long to see if my application has been accepted, and with the new website I don't get it. How do I see if I've been accepted?
body_tagged: I've been waiting so long to see if my application has been accepted, and with the new website I don't get it. How do I see if I've been accepted?
title: Staff Applications, I don't get it

replies.body: Just trust me, you haven't been accepted. Sorry D:
replies.body_tagged: Just trust me, you haven't been accepted. Sorry D:

replies.body: Okay, all good I just wish when people applied there was some more efficient way of notifying them instead of them having to check every few days. I checked every few days for the past like 6-8 months ._.

replies.body: You are obviously not active enough to know what is happening. If you weren't listed on the post a few months ago or contacted then you obviously were not accepted.
